original_text: When they could not find a way to do this because of the crowd, they went up on the roof and lowered him on his mat through the tiles into the middle of the crowd, right in front of Jesus.
korean_text: 무리 때문에 메고 들어갈 길을 얻지 못한지라 지붕에 올라가 기와를 벗기고 병자를 침상째 무리 가운데로 예수 앞에 달아 내리니

sentences.original_text: When they could not find a way to do this
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 이것을 할 방법을 찾지 못했을 때

sentences.original_text: they went up on the roof
and lowered him on his mat
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그를 그의 매트 위에 내려보냈습니다

sentences.original_text: into the middle of the crowd
